name: Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 1: The Order of the Stone
description: THE ADVENTURE OF A LIFETIME IN THE WORLD OF MINECRAFT In this five part episodic series, youâ€™ll embark on a perilous adventure across the Overworld, through the Nether, to the End, and beyond. You and your friends revere the legendary Order of the Stone: Warrior, Redstone Engineer, Griefer, and Architect; slayers of the Ender Dragon. While at EnderCon in hopes of meeting Gabriel the Warrior, you and your friends discover that something is wrong... something dreadful. Terror is unleashed, and you must set out on a quest to find The Order of the Stone if you are to save your world from oblivion. Created by award-winning adventure game powerhouse Telltale Games, in partnership with Minecraft creators, Mojang You will drive the story through the decisions you make: what you say to people (and how you say it), and what you choose to do in moments of thrilling action will make this YOUR story
